mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.introduce, CASE WHEN f2.user_id IS NOT NULL AND f3.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS relation FROM USER u JOIN follows f ON u.id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN follows f2 ON f2.user_id = u.id AND f2.target_user_id = #{visitorUserId} LEFT JOIN follows f3 ON f3.user_id = #{visitorUserId} AND f3.target_user_id = u.id WHERE f.target_user_id = #{userId}
